message:
The replica {{ replica_name.name }} replicating off of leader database {{ database_id.name }} has a high replication lag. This is measured in bytes. It means that requests reading the replica database may be reading out of date data. Potential resolutions:

1. If database load is below 50% cpu and not expected to increase, disable the replica (see Knockoff configuration)
2. List out and kill queries that are potentially delaying the replication lag 
 @slack-incidents-infrastructure,@slack-incidents-platform-services
name: Production Handshake Replica ({{ replica_name.name }}) High Replication Lag
